reviews.review_msg: Fantastic professor, very approachable in office hours and is a very fair marker. Very accommodating to the needs of students: For our last assignment we have a film screening that is threatened by a bus strike, and so hes offering to drive students in the event the strike affects us. Weekly readings are manageable. Overall A+

He's the best. His classes are fascinating, well organized and he likes to adapt to changing times. He took time out of every class to meet with us about our papers and gave us freedom for the final project. I've taken three of his classes. An absolute gem. Quite a bit of reading though.

A true scholar and a nice person. Very caring and approachable and respect all students who work hard. However, course readings are heavy and required for discussions and pop quiz. No tolerance to students who is late for class or no prep for discussion, which will cause a huge reduction on the grade.

The class was run by the students, meaning participation and class discussion/activity based. He makes you work for your grade for sure. Encourages you to talk in class, and marks a little tough, but I am glad I got to have him as a prof. Highly recommend visiting him in office hours. He gives great ideas regarding your project and other areas.
Wouldn't even let me hand in late work.
